Headline: CNN 10 - February 18, 2020
Article_Body: February 18, 2020 Desolate shopping malls, health checkpoints, and empty restaurants in China: The Wuhan coronavirus takes an economic toll. Meantime, massive swarms of locusts cause problems for East Africa. And a purse that was lost in 1957 becomes a time capsule after being discovered at an Ohio school. CNN 10 serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts ideal for explanation seekers on the go or in the classroom. The show's priority is to identify stories of international significance and then clearly describe why they're making news, who is affected, and how the events fit into a complex, international society. Thank you for using CNN 10
